Tom Jepson | Coach & Consultant

Coaching UX Consultancy Get In Touch

Coaching for creative pros

(and anyone who creates digital products, websites, or apps!)

Leaning into a decade-plus of experience in the digital design space I want to offer practical guidance to help you make the most of what you have, identify where you could grow, and why. If I can help you avoid making some of the mistakes I've made over the years I'll do that, too!

I offer 1:1 remote mentoring and coaching sessions and am a registered student mentor with Springboard on their UX/UI course.

Book a discovery call

Why speak with a mentor or coach?

  • You feel adrift in your career or like your work has plateaued and need some practical help to set you on the right path.
  • You're struggling to communicate and collaborate with your team and feel your expertise is often overlooked.
  • You are looking for a fresh start in the world of UX design but don't know where to begin.

While I can't tell you what your challenges are, I can help you find them. Be ready to think about your journey and dig deep; I tend to ask a lot of questions!

Who is it for?

  • You're thinking about taking your first role as a designer or are shifting your career to focus on UX.
  • You're a UX designer in a junior or mid-level position and want to jump into the next stage of your career.
  • You work with designers / creative people and want to get more out of those relationships.

Everyone has challenges unique to them. I work primarily with UX designers (and other design professionals in related fields) however sessions are not exclusively for designers.

"Over the six months Tom has been my mentor, he's held me accountable for my own growth and empowered me to succeed. His knowledge, constructive feedback, and support helped me land my first UX role! Tom is rock solid."

Sarah Babich

Springboard UX Mentee

What can we cover in our sessions?

No two coachees are the same; everyone is unique in their own way. We can discuss any challenges you might have in your work or life as a creative pro. The following areas are common conversation starts I've had with clients over the years.

  • Uncovering and resolving your career challenges
  • Finding your niche as a creative professional
  • Levelling-up your practical professional skills
  • Finding and starting your first design role
  • Career switching into design
  • Managing and working with stakeholders
  • Presenting yourself and your work
  • Navigating design work in the real world
  • Improving your communication to engage your team
  • Become a stronger, more focussed collaborator

"I had a session with Tom on approaching my career in UX and product design. He really understands the subject; his questions were direct and made me think! I'm very grateful for his input and advice. I'd definitely recommend Tom!"

Nabil Kazi

Design Coachee

Why have sessions with me?

As a late-starting, self-taught designer who has 'come up' through the industry, I know what it is like to feel out of your depth or slightly adrift. I want to help you.

Throughout my career I have lead and worked with designers, developers, product owners, marketers and more in a range of different industries; from startups like Pharmaseal, Tully, and Buying Butler to corporate enterprises like Esendex and Experian. The experience I've gained working with these individuals has informed and shaped how I approach my UX consultancy today.

With every mentee and coachee, I look to dig into the real challenges they are facing; helping them understand what's going on under the surface. Together we can identify what really matters and find ways for you to reach your goals.

How do we get started?

  • Arrange a free, 30-minute discovery call with me to talk about your needs right now. We both want to make sure mentoring or coaching with me is a good fit.
  • Book a session or session plan with your first call at a time to suit you. Single sessions cost £80 and are paid upfront.
  • Complete the pre-session questionnaire; to make sure we use your time most effectively it’s good to learn more about you before we begin.
  • Attend your 1:1 session on Zoom at the booked time.

Start your learning journey

Let's have a chat to get you on the road to your new career, better collaboration, and being the best you that you can be. Using the links below book a free discovery call to discuss which route might be best for you or dive right in with your first session.
